attributes.action: Remove GS4 from running the children's STCs Medway  and Oakhill
attributes.additional_details: BBC panorama shows horrendous evidence of abuse . GS4 have already lost the contract Rainsbrook because of their failure to these children . They are children who need support and good role models to give them a chance to have a good life when they come out . Some children do not have supportive parents or a role model on the outside to keep them focused and positive . GS4 has failed them ! We may be able to save them if the Goverment bring in a new company to take care of this children
attributes.background: Gs4 have been running 3 children's secure units and have failed with all 3 , these children as young as 12 are placed there either after being convicted of a crime or waiting for a court hearing to find them guilty or not guilty . The abuse the children are enduring is heartbreaking .
